textAfterTable: 2 Songs Customer Reviews Above-average original, awesome cover.           by Torturephile The Machine Head original song, "Killers & Kings", is somewhat close to the song from The Blackening, "Clenching the Fists of Dissent", except it lacks a punchline/climax during its solo. It offers a similar "marching" pace and riff to the aforementioned song. McClain's drumming in this song stands out. However, the Ignite cover, "Our Darkest Days/Bleeding", is an amazing Melodic Hardcore song that offers a pretty summary of Machine Head's discography, except the two Nu Metal albums. The band's performance is very top-notch, with heart-felt vocal performances from Mr. Flynn. At least metal is not dead           by Machineheadrises This is the only band doing what metallica, slayer and pantera started. This is another great song by them. Big Fan           by Asylumjerk
